Usage:

```bash
$ polyaxon user [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...
```

Commands for user management.

## activate

Usage:

```bash
polyaxon user activate [OPTIONS] USERNAME
```

Activate a user.

Example:

```bash
$ polyaxon user activate david
```


## delete

Usage:

```bash
polyaxon user delete [OPTIONS] USERNAME
```

Delete a user.

Example:

```bash
$ polyaxon user delete david
```
